sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaBriefcase, FaGraduationCap, FaCode, FaUsers, FaTrophy, FaCalendarAlt, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaExternalLinkAlt, FaGithub, FaLinkedin, FaLaptopCode, FaRobot, FaShieldAlt, FaMicrochip } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Experience.css'; const Experience = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('work'); const workExperience = [ { id: 1, period: '2023 - Present', role: 'Software Engineering Student', company: 'University of Technology', location: 'Software Engineering Department', type: 'Academic', description: 'Active participation in software development projects, AI research, and cybersecurity labs. Collaborating with peers on innovative solutions and contributing to research initiatives.', achievements: [ 'Developed multiple web applications using React and Django', 'Implemented machine learning models for data analysis and prediction', 'Participated in cybersecurity competitions and workshops', 'Mentored junior students in programming fundamentals', 'Contributed to open-source projects and research papers', 'Maintained 3.8/4.0 GPA while working on complex projects' ], technologies: ['React', 'Django', 'Python', 'Java', 'Machine Learning', 'Cybersecurity'], link: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/basantabdalla' }, { id: 2, period: '2022 - 2023', role: 'Programming Tutor', company: 'Student Learning Center', location: 'University Campus', type: 'Teaching', description: 'Provided one-on-one and group tutoring sessions for programming courses, helping students understand complex concepts and improve their coding skills.', achievements: [ 'Tutored 20+ students in Java and Python programming', 'Improved student success rates by 25% in programming courses', 'Developed comprehensive study materials and practice exercises', 'Received excellent feedback from students and faculty', 'Organized coding workshops and study groups', 'Helped students prepare for technical interviews' ], technologies: ['Java', 'Python', 'Teaching', 'Mentoring', 'Problem Solving'], link: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/basantabdalla' }, { id: 3, period: '2022 - 2023', role: 'Research Assistant', company: 'AI Research Lab', location: 'Computer Science Department', type: 'Research', description: 'Assisted in research projects focused on machine learning applications, data analysis, and algorithm development for real-world problems.', achievements: [ 'Contributed to research on natural language processing', 'Developed data preprocessing pipelines for large datasets', 'Implemented and tested machine learning algorithms', 'Co-authored research paper on ML applications', 'Presented findings at department seminars', 'Collaborated with graduate students on research projects' ], technologies: ['Python', 'Machine Learning', 'Data Analysis', 'Research', 'TensorFlow'], link: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad' } ]; const internships = [ { id: 1, period: 'Summer 2023', role: 'Software Development Intern', company: 'TechStart Solutions', location: 'Remote', type: 'Internship', description: 'Worked on developing web applications and APIs, contributing to the company\'s product development and learning industry best practices.', achievements: [ 'Developed RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and Java', 'Implemented frontend features using React and TypeScript', 'Participated in code reviews and agile development processes', 'Learned about CI/CD pipelines and deployment strategies', 'Collaborated with senior developers on production code', 'Gained experience with cloud platforms (AWS)' ], technologies: ['Java', 'Spring Boot', 'React', 'TypeScript', 'AWS', 'Git'], link: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/basantabdalla' } ]; const volunteering = [ { id: 1, period: '2022 - Present', role: 'Open Source Contributor', company: 'Various Projects', location: 'GitHub', type: 'Volunteering', description: 'Contributing to open-source projects, helping improve software tools, and learning from the global developer community.', achievements: [ 'Contributed to 5+ open-source projects on GitHub', 'Fixed bugs and implemented new features', 'Improved documentation and code quality', 'Received recognition from project maintainers', 'Helped other developers through issue discussions', 'Built a network of open-source contributors' ], technologies: ['Git', 'GitHub', 'Open Source', 'Collaboration', 'Documentation'], link: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad' }, { id: 2, period: '2023 - Present', role: 'Coding Mentor', company: 'CodeMentor Program', location: 'Online', type: 'Volunteering', description: 'Volunteering as a coding mentor to help beginners learn programming and guide them through their coding journey.', achievements: [ 'Mentored 15+ beginner programmers', 'Conducted weekly coding sessions', 'Created learning resources and tutorials', 'Helped students build their first projects', 'Provided career guidance and advice', 'Received positive feedback from mentees' ], technologies: ['Mentoring', 'Teaching', 'Programming', 'Leadership', 'Communication'], link: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/basantabdalla' } ]; const skills = { technical: [ { name: 'Programming Languages', items: ['Java', 'Python', 'JavaScript', 'C++', 'SQL'] }, { name: 'Web Development', items: ['React', 'Django', 'Spring Boot', 'Node.js', 'HTML/CSS'] }, { name: 'AI & Machine Learning', items: ['TensorFlow', 'Scikit-learn', 'Pandas', 'NumPy', 'NLTK'] }, { name: 'Databases', items: ['MySQL', 'PostgreSQL', 'MongoDB', 'SQLite', 'Redis'] }, { name: 'Tools & Platforms', items: ['Git', 'Docker', 'AWS', 'VS Code', 'Arduino'] } ], soft: [ { name: 'Leadership', items: ['Team Management', 'Project Planning', 'Decision Making'] }, { name: 'Communication', items: ['Technical Writing', 'Presentation Skills', 'Cross-functional Collaboration'] }, { name: 'Problem Solving', items: ['Analytical Thinking', 'Creative Solutions', 'Systematic Approach'] }, { name: 'Learning', items: ['Fast Learner', 'Adaptability', 'Continuous Improvement'] } ] }; const renderExperienceCard = (experience) => (

{experience.role}

{experience.company}

{experience.location}

{experience.period} {experience.type}

{experience.description}

Key Achievements:

    {experience.achievements.map((achievement, index) => (
  • {achievement}
    • ))}

Technologies & Skills:

{experience.technologies.map((tech, index) => ( {tech} ))}
View Profile
); const renderSkillsSection = (skillsData, title) => (

{title}

{skillsData.map((category, index) => (

{category.name}

{category.items.map((item, idx) => ( {item} ))}
))}
); return (

Experience

My professional journey, internships, and contributions
{activeTab === 'work' && (

Work Experience

{workExperience.map(renderExperienceCard)}
)} {activeTab === 'internships' && (

Internships

{internships.map(renderExperienceCard)}
)} {activeTab === 'volunteering' && (

Volunteering & Contributions

{volunteering.map(renderExperienceCard)}
)} {activeTab === 'skills' && (

Skills Overview

{renderSkillsSection(skills.technical, 'Technical Skills')} {renderSkillsSection(skills.soft, 'Soft Skills & Competencies')} )}

Interested in working together?

Let's discuss how I can contribute to your team or project.

Get In Touch View Full Resume
); }; export default Experience;
